content:
I'd be happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have have access to real-time information, and the Premier League schedule is subject to change. But I can suggest a few ways to find the most up-to-date schedule for this Sunday's matches.

1. **Check the official Premier League website**: You can visit the official Premier League website ([www.premierleague.com](http://www.premierleague.com)) and navigate to the "Fixtures" section to find the schedule for this Sunday's matches.
2. **Use a sports website or app**: Websites like BBC Sport, Sky Sports, or ESPN, and apps like the Premier League app or Forza Football, often have the latest schedules and updates on Premier League matches.
3. **Follow Premier League social media**: You can follow the official Premier League social media accounts on Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram to get the latest updates on match schedules and times.
4. **Check your local TV listings**: If you're planning to watch the matches on TV, check your local TV listings to see which channels are broadcasting the matches and at what time.

Remember to double-check the schedule before the weekend to ensure you don't miss any of the action!
